summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3633 for the improvement of East 58th Street, from 5th Avenue Northeast to Latona Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 44871, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
